page.title: 10Beating for the Shoot
page.content: Beating is a very good sport and we do it with sticks,dogs and guns.Usually there are two beaters and maybe ten people with guns,as well as several dogs.The beaters each go to a corner at the bottom of the wood.Three people with guns go to the left and to the right to the bottom of the wood.The rest go to the top. The beaters start tapping and the guns work there way down to the bottom.As they go down,the dogs sniff through the brambles and when the pheasants fly out,the guns shoot them.The beaters at the bottom keep the pheasants facing the guns.
